DOC.brief_summary: The current study examine safety , tolerability , plasma pharmacokinetics ( PK ) , plasma pharmacodynamics ( PD ) single-doses GSK2647544.The study conduct randomize , single-blind , placebo control , 4-way crossover single oral ascend dose design 2 independent cohort , eight healthy male subject cohort . Each potential subject undergo Screening visit , Treatment Phase Follow-up visit .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Pharmacokinetics Pharmacodynamics Single , Oral Escalating Doses GSK2647544 Healthy Volunteers
